name: YHA Pittwater Eco
description:
YHA Pittwater Eco is a Lonely Planet Author's Pick hostel. 

This unique water access oasis is the perfect city escape. Located within the Ku-ring-gai Chase National Park, this beautiful hostel is only 30 km north of Sydney's central city area. 

YHA Pittwater Eco IS NOT ACCESSIBILE BY CAR. The best way to access the property is via Ferry from Church Point Wharf with the last Ferry departing at 6:30pm on Weekends & public holidays and at 7:00pm on Weekdays.

The hostel has 8 bedrooms, a very well equipped kitchen and a cosy lounge room with a log fire for colder times. The verandah has stunning views across Pittwater harbour to the National Park. 

Take a scenic ferry ride, sail on the harbour or bushwalk to aboriginal engraving sites and stunning lookouts. Hire a kayak for a paddle around the bay or just relax in a hammock with the wallabys beside you and the native birds above.

Bring your food as there are no shops at the hostel.

houseRules.notes:
Please inform YHA Pittwater Eco in advance of your expected arrival time.

Check in from 1pm to 8pm
If you are arriving after 8pm you must contact the property in advance to make arrangements.

Please check ferry timetable prior to arrival to ensure that you can get to the property.

Note: You cannot drive to this property. Only accessible by ferry from Church Point ferry wharf to Halls Wharf. There is an inclined trek from the ferry wharf to the property which may not be suitable for visitors with mobility issues.

There is paid parking at Church Point ferry wharf, just outside the Pasadena, however this can be costly. 
For free parking search Google Maps for Bakers Rd Church Point, itâ€™s about a 10-15 minute walk from the ferry wharf we suggest dropping off your food, luggage and passengers at the ferry wharf whilst you park and walk back to the wharf.

Cancellation Policy is subject to the type of rate you have booked:
Flexible Rate - Cancellation or changes can be made free of charge 1 day prior to arrival.
Non-Refundable Rate - Pre-paid non-refundable, full cancellation penalty will apply if cancelled or modified.

Guests are required to show photo identification and credit card upon check-in. 

We require taking a profile photo of all guests staying in shared rooms or private rooms with a shared bathroom. If you do not wish to have your photo taken, we will not be able to accommodate you.

Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or legal guardian.

The supervision of guests under 18 years of age remains the responsibility of their parent or legal guardian whilst at a YHA property. Guests under 18 years of age are not permitted to stay in Co-living shared dormitory rooms, they can only be accommodated in private rooms. For further information on the YHA child safety policy please contact the property directly.
